mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manufactor ("name", item_type, ins_date) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.select: SELECT manufactor.id, manufactor.name, item_type.name AS item_type, manufactor.ins_date FROM manufactor LEFT JOIN item_type ON manufactor.item_type = item_type.id WHERE manufactor.is_alive = 1 GROUP BY manufactor.name, manufactor.id, item_type.name
